summary: Breckerfeld is a town in the district of Ennepe-Ruhr-Kreis, in North Rhine-Westphalia, .
full_text: Breckerfeld is a town in the district of Ennepe-Ruhr-Kreis, in North Rhine-Westphalia, . It is located in the southeastern-most part of the Ruhr area in northern Sauerland. The town is a member of Regionalverband Ruhr .
title: Breckerfeld
